principles: Professional & Attractive Aesthetic (Meta Business Dashboard inspired)

components.name: Header
components.description: Top navigation bar with logo, title, and theme switcher. Will include user avatar/quick actions later.
components.styling_notes: Professional, clean, with subtle gradients/shadows for a glossy effect.

components.name: Sidebar
components.description: Left-hand navigation menu with role-based menu items and icons.
components.styling_notes: Dark background, clear active states, smooth transitions.

components.name: Card
components.description: Modular display units for statistics, summaries, or individual items.
components.styling_notes: Rounded corners, subtle shadows, clean typography, adaptable to theme.

components.name: Table
components.description: Responsive data tables for displaying lists of information (e.g., users, activity logs).
components.styling_notes: Clean lines, alternating row colors, hover effects, clear headers.

components.name: Button
components.description: Standardized buttons for various actions, styled per theme and role.
components.styling_notes: Consistent padding, border-radius, hover/active states, subtle gradients.

components.name: Form
components.description: Standardized input fields, labels, and validation for data entry.
components.styling_notes: Clean, clear, and user-friendly input elements.

components.name: Modal
components.description: Pop-up dialogs for confirmations, edits, or detailed views.
components.styling_notes: Centered, overlay background, clear close actions.

components.name: Theme Switcher
components.description: Toggle for switching between light and dark modes.
components.styling_notes: Visually distinct, smooth transition between themes.

icon_strategy.usage: Used for all menu items, action buttons, and key visual indicators to enhance professionalism and clarity. Icons will be chosen to semantically represent their associated functionality.

instructions: This file documents the UI design system, components, and styling guidelines. Do not delete or modify these instructions. Follow the workflow as described in Readme.md.
